hero.title: Predict the Future
hero.description: Trade real-world events on Hedera. A decentralized prediction protocol built for speed, fairness, and the next generation of web3.

betOnEvents.title: Bet on Events
betOnEvents.description: Trade on real-world events with YES/NO predictions. View order books and place trades at your preferred odds.

provideLiquidity.title: Provide Liquidity
provideLiquidity.description: Provide pending limit orders within the spread to receive rewards.

governance.title: Governance
governance.description: Vote on community proposals and shape the future of the platform.

stakePrsm.title: Stake PRSM
stakePrsm.description: Stake PRSM tokens to earn xPRSM and participate in governance with enhanced voting power.

markets.noMarketsFound: No prediction markets found matching your criteria.
markets.searchDatabase: Search markets... (Press Enter to search database)
markets.noMarketsFoundEmpty: Check back later for new markets

emptyState.noFeaturedDesc: No markets are currently featured in this category
emptyState.noTrendingDesc: No markets are currently trending in this category
emptyState.noNewDesc: No markets have been created in the last 30 days
emptyState.noEndingSoonDesc: All markets have resolution dates more than 7 days away
emptyState.noHighVolumeDesc: No markets currently have volume above $10,000

stats.tradersSubtitle: (As measured by activity over the last month.)

wallet.connectionFailedDesc: Failed to connect wallet. Please try again.
wallet.balancesRefreshedDesc: Your wallet balances have been refreshed

rewards.description: Earn rewards by placing orders within the spread. The tighter the spread, the higher your potential earnings.
rewards.noMarketsFound: No markets found matching your criteria

stake.title: Stake your PRSM to Earn Rewards
stake.subtitle: Stake PRSM and receive xPRSM.
stake.stakeTokensDesc: Stake your PRSM tokens to receive xPRSM and earn rewards
stake.step2Desc: Get xPRSM governance tokens with voting power
stake.step3Desc: Accumulate rewards and increased voting power
stake.positiveAmountsOnly: You can only stake positive amounts of PRSM.

marketFactory.title: Market Factory
marketFactory.description: Create and deploy prediction markets through community governance

form.proposalDescriptionPlaceholder: Explain why this market should be created
form.marketQuestionPlaceholder: e.g., Will Bitcoin reach $100,000 by end of 2024?
form.marketDescriptionPlaceholder: Detailed description of the market and conditions
form.proposalVotingDateHint: Proposal voting must end between 1-14 days from now and before the market resolution date.

alerts.connectWallet: Please connect your wallet to create a market proposal.
alerts.votingPowerRequired: You need at least {{required}} voting power to create proposals. You currently have {{current}} voting power.

dashboard.noProposalsYet: You haven't created any proposals yet
dashboard.connectWalletDashboard: Connect your wallet to view governance dashboard

portfolio.title: My Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Track your event prediction market positions and performance

empty.message: No positions found. Start trading on some markets to build your portfolio!

wallet.balancesRefreshedDesc: Your wallet balances have been updated

governance.title: Governance
governance.subtitle: Participate in protocol governance by voting on proposals with your xPRSM tokens. Shape the future of Prism Market through decentralized decision-making.

votingPower.title: Your Voting Power
votingPower.connectedDesc: Your current xPRSM balance and voting power
votingPower.disconnectedDesc: Connect your wallet to view your voting power
votingPower.connectWallet: Please connect your wallet to participate in governance
votingPower.loadFailed: Failed to load governance token balance

dao.title: The Prism Market DAO
dao.subtitle: A decentralized autonomous organization empowering xPRSM holders to collectively govern the protocol, shape market creation, and guide the evolution of prediction markets on Hedera.

tokenGovernance.title: Token Governance
tokenGovernance.description: PRSM is the utility token earned through participation. Stake PRSM to receive xPRSM governance tokens with voting power. Longer staking periods provide higher multipliers.

governanceScope.title: Governance Scope
governanceScope.description: The DAO governs market creation, protocol parameters, treasury allocations, and platform fees. All major decisions require community consensus.

proposalLifecycle.title: Proposal Lifecycle
proposalLifecycle.description: Proposals progress through Draft → Proposal Voting → Election Voting phases. Each requires minimum quorum thresholds before advancing.

parameters.title: Governance Parameters
parameters.subtitle: Current settings that govern the proposal and voting process

minXprsm.label: Min. xPRSM to Create
minXprsm.description: Minimum voting power required to submit proposals

proposalQuorum.label: Proposal Quorum
proposalQuorum.description: Voting power needed to pass proposal phase

electionQuorum.label: Election Quorum
electionQuorum.description: Voting power needed for final approval

votingDuration.label: Voting Duration
votingDuration.description: Time allocated for each voting phase

voteOnProposals.title: Vote on Proposals
voteOnProposals.description: Cast your vote on protocol upgrades, market creation proposals, and parameter changes using your xPRSM tokens.

communityDriven.title: Community Driven
communityDriven.description: Every xPRSM holder has a voice in the direction of the protocol. Your stake determines your voting power.

transparentProcess.title: Transparent Process
transparentProcess.description: All proposals and votes are recorded on-chain, ensuring full transparency and accountability.

shapeFuture.title: Shape the Future
shapeFuture.description: Influence which markets get created, how rewards are distributed, and the evolution of the platform.

step1.title: Acquire PRSM Tokens
step1.description: Earn PRSM tokens through trading, providing liquidity, or participating in the ecosystem.

step2.title: Stake for xPRSM
step2.description: Stake your PRSM tokens to receive xPRSM governance tokens with voting power.

step3.title: Review Proposals
step3.description: Browse active proposals including market creation, parameter changes, and protocol upgrades.

step4.title: Cast Your Vote
step4.description: Vote FOR, AGAINST, or ABSTAIN on proposals. Your voting power is proportional to your xPRSM holdings.
